00053 class WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT wxLIRCCSessionManager : public wxEvtHandler
00054 {
00055 public :
00056         
00062         static inline wxLIRCCSessionManager* Get() 
00063         {
00064                 if(m_instance == 0)
00065             m_instance = new wxLIRCCSessionManager();
00066 
00067         return m_instance;
00068         };
00069         
00075         static inline void Free()
00076         {
00077                 if( m_instance != 0 )
00078                         delete m_instance;
00079         
00080                 m_instance = 0;
00081         };
00082         
00084         const wxLIRCCSessions& GetSessions() const {return m_sessions;};
00085         
00090         wxLIRCCSession* FindSession( irc_session_t* session );

00099 
00101         void DestroySession( irc_session_t* session );
